definition: The term "oberer" refers to something that is situated or located at a higher position or level in relation to something else. It is commonly used to describe a specific part, area, or section that is higher or uppermost within a given context.

examples.german: Der obere Teil des Gebäudes ist renoviert.
examples.english: The upper part of the building is renovated.

examples.german: Die obere Etage hat einen schönen Ausblick.
examples.english: The upper floor has a beautiful view.
The top button has fallen off.
The upper limit has been exceeded.
